title: Dots - Interface
content: This is the start to a 3D typeface that could be used with a 3D interface.
author: dday

comments.content: This is a typeface that looks too familiar, almost to the point of discomfort. I'm cramping up. Just gas, not the typeface. It has an arts and crafts look to it, which is nice. Interesting forms. I wanna see this thing spin in space.
